Package context.arch.widget


Class Summary
ClassifierWidget Extends Widget to provide capabilities for reading non-constant Attributes from a WEKA .arff file.
OffsetThread This class is responsible for retrieving and updating the offset between the local clock the component is running on and a "more accurate" global time clock
RegistrationFrame This class implements a frame that runs in its own thread.
SequenceWidget Widget that repeats attributes for multiple times depending on sequence length.
Widget This class is the basic context widget, with attributes and methods that should apply to all context widgets.
Widget.WidgetData Convenience class to wrap Attributes as an encapsulation to pass around to different components.
WidgetBean Convenience method to declare a widget using the Java Beans paradigm.
WidgetHandle This class implements a widget handler object, encapsulating the information needed to subscribe to a widget.
WidgetHandles This class maintains a list of widget handles, allows additions, removals and updates to individual handles.
WidgetXmlParser Utility class to generate Widget from an XML declaration.
